channel.title: Newb Graphics
channel.description:
Hey. i am starting to make signatures and other things. here are my irst 2 that utually suceeded. i know they arent good, but im jsut starting
Soma Cruz - AlphaEvil1 [img]http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/8/10/f_SomaCruzAlpm_75a2d39.png[/img]
Master Chief - AlphaEvil1 [img]http://img28.picoodle.com/img/img28/3/8/10/f_MasterChiefm_f92a9de.png[/img]
Some new ones i made:
Cruious George - AlhpaEvil1 - TEST LOL [img]http://img28.picoodle.com/img/img28/3/8/10/f_CuriousGeorm_db22f41.png[/img]
Please dont flame. :(
Please reply for waht you think of first time use of signatures.

item.title: Newb Graphics
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:7, topic:224798”][quote author=Cruzer link=topic=295431.msg2379290#msg2379290 date=1218496394]

If I even attempted to be honest with you, it would crush your spirit. So I’m going to lie and say they’re wonderful.

What’s wrong with you?
[/quote]

I saw a cripple trying to get soft serve from an ice cream machine at a local restaurant, and I had a change of heart.[/quote]
wow life changing event? did you help them?

Read full topic

item.title: Newb Graphics

item.description:
@Vector_Graphix wrote:

To tell you the truth you need to get colors that BLEND and LOOK GOOD together also try use more brushes and blend the text also look into c4d’s…
